tool_description: Evaluates the urgency and severity of diagnostic trouble codes to prioritize repairs and determine driving safety.

code_definitions.description: Corresponding definitions for each DTC code

affected_systems.description: Systems affected by each diagnostic code

current_symptoms.description: Observable symptoms reported by driver (rough idle, stalling, etc.)

mileage_since_code.description: Miles driven since each code first appeared

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: DTC codes, definitions, and affected systems arrays must have same length.
Invalid severity criteria: Current symptoms must be from recognized symptom database.
Negative mileage: Mileage since code values must be non-negative integers.
Insufficient data: At least DTC codes, definitions, and affected systems required for analysis.
usage: Provide matched arrays of codes, definitions, and affected systems. Optionally include current symptoms and mileage data for more accurate severity assessment.

severity_levels.description: Severity rating for each code (critical, high, medium, low)

urgency_recommendations.description: Recommended action timeline for each code

safety_assessment.description: Overall vehicle safety status based on all codes
